Perfect torrent, but my word, this movie BLOWS GOATS. I registered just to tell you that.

There is nothing wrong with the story or the movie technicals.  This is one of those movies that you love or hate, depending on your genre tastes.  If you love this kind of fantasy genre then you'll love this movie, otherwise you'll hate it.  Personally I think this movie will gain a cult following.
This extended version has 17 minutes of additional fight scenes. These are the scenes they took out so it could get a PG-13 rating.
